text: My life is going fine yet the only thing that makes me feel even slightly happy is the thought of ending itI m   and have been struggling with ever worsening mental illness for a few years now  I always thought that the reason I was depressed was because my life isn t going good at this point in time  but after some thought  I realise my life is just fine  it s my brain that s getting more and more sick   I have the grades I want  not many friends but I m happy with the ones I ve got  I m successfully sorting myself out after a long period of depression by going out more and re decorating my entire room  yet I still feel horrifically depressed  much worse even than before  I feel like living in this world is hell and that I don t belong here  I feel no sense of happiness or emotion towards absolutely anything  I m always locked inside my own head  I m ruining the small amount of relationships I have left through depressive episodes and intense anxiety   I used to be happy  even just a year ago  I was energetic and loved every little thing about life  Suicidal or depressive thoughts would never even cross my mind  but now it s the only thing that latches onto my thought process  no matter what I m doing  I have suicidal thoughts all day and every day  not because my life is bad  but it s the only thing that gives me a little rush of excitement  the idea that I can just end this nightmare at any time   I just want this nightmare to end  I want to find whatever light was shining over my life before  I just want to feel something  anything
summary: Suicide is the only thing that makes me feel even slightly happy. I have been struggling with a mental illness for a few years. My life is going fine but I still suffer from depression. I used to be energetic and energetic a year ago, but now I'm depressed and suicidal thoughts are all that keep me going.
